member.name: M:Byway.CourseManagement.Algoriza.API.Controllers.CoursesController.GetCourses(Byway.Application.Specifications.CourseSpecParams)
member.summary: Retrieves courses with optional filtering and sorting
member.param:
Sorting criteria (default: 6 - Oldest First):
• 1 = Price (Low to High)
• 2 = Price (High to Low)
• 3 = Rating (Low to High)
• 4 = Rating (High to Low)
• 5 = Newest First
• 6 = Oldest First
member.returns: List of courses sorted according to the specified criteria
